name: Power Kicks
description: Develop explosive and powerful kicks that can deal significant damage in a fight.

cards.title: Roundhouse Kick
cards.description: A signature Muay Thai kick delivered with full-body rotation for maximum force.
bulletpoints: Pivot on the supporting foot for power
Strike with the shin rather than the foot
cards.summaryText: Whip the roundhouse by pivoting hard, driving the shin, and letting momentum carry through.

cards.title: Low Leg Kick
cards.description: A powerful kick aimed at the opponentâ€™s thigh to slow them down.
bulletpoints: Aim for the inner or outer thigh
Use the hips to generate force
Quickly reset stance to avoid counters
cards.summaryText: Chop the low kick into the thigh with hip drive, then snap back before they counter.
